channel.title: Hacking Runescape TEXT using cheatengine
channel.description:
ok this is what you do you open cheat engine, then select the program javaw and change the value type to text then search for the text it has to be spelled properly or it wont work and once youve found the values simply change them,
I did this to make it look like i leveled to 99 smithing it works better than photoshop since it uses runescapes own font and can be done in runescape itself.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 17, 2006, 08:33:14 PM[/size][hr]heres an example: [code] http://www.rsboards.com/viewtopic.php?p=219705#219705 [/code]
Everyone on the board feel for it lol
such a bunch of noobs lol.

item.title: Hacking Runescape TEXT using cheatengine
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Dylan_11741:

Rofl Cheat Engine is a program that mainly just makes stuff look like its there. In RuneScape that is. In other games that are like html based or watever actually work. Mainly cuz there shitty games =]

Umm…you are clueless. Cheat engine attaches to running processes and does your bidding.

Read full topic
